verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH3947> "Take a large <WH1419> tablet, <WH1549> and write <WH3789> on it with a man <WH582>'s pen, <WH2747> <WH4122> 'For Maher Shalal Hash Baz;'

It will sweep <WH2498> onward into Judah. <WH3063> It will overflow <WH7857> and pass through; <WH5674> it will reach <WH5060> even to the neck; <WH6677> and the stretching out <WH4298> of its wings <WH3671> will fill <WH4393> the breadth <WH7341> of your land, <WH776> Immanuel. <WH6005>

Take <WH5779> counsel <WH6098> together, <WH5779> and it will be brought to nothing; <WH6565> speak <WH1696> the word, <WH1697> and it will not stand: <WH6965> for God is with us. <WH410>"
For Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH559> thus to me with a strong <WH2393> hand, <WH3027> and instructed <WH3256> me not to walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of this people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559>

"Don't <WH559> say, <WH7195> 'A conspiracy!' concerning all about which this people <WH5971> say, <WH559> <WH7195> 'A conspiracy!' neither fear <WH3372> their threats, <WH4172> nor be terrorized. <WH6206>

Wrap up <WH6887> the testimony. <WH8584> Seal <WH2856> the law <WH8451> among my disciples. <WH3928>
I will wait <WH2442> for Yahweh, <WH3068> who hides <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and I will look for him. <WH6960>

Behold, <WH3206> I and the children whom Yahweh <WH3068> has given <WH5414> me are for signs <WH226> and for wonders <WH4159> in Israel <WH3478> from Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> who dwells <WH7931> in Mount <WH2022> Zion. <WH6726>

When they tell <WH559> you, <WH1875> "Consult with those who have familiar spirits <WH178> and with the wizards, <WH3049> who chirp <WH6850> and who mutter: <WH1897>" shouldn't <WH5971> a people consult <WH1875> with their God? <WH430> Should they consult the dead <WH4191> on behalf of the living? <WH2416>
Turn to the law <WH8451> and to the testimony! <WH8584> If they don't <WH559> speak according to this word, <WH1697> surely there is no morning for them. <WH7837>

They will pass <WH5674> through it, <WH7185> very distressed and hungry; <WH7457> and it will happen that when they are hungry, <WH7456> they will worry, <WH7107> and curse <WH7043> by their king <WH4428> and by their God. <WH430> They will turn <WH6437> their faces upward, <WH4605>
